mods.abstract: Page 41 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 shows bushel barrels loaded with potatoes. A wooden folding ruler is used to illustrate scale.; Photograph 2 shows a bushel barrel loaded with globe or bur artichokes.; Photograph 3 shows potatoes stacked high on a plate.
mods.note: Photograph 2 was published in the following journal. Kelley, E.B, Powell, O. & Tiebout, G.L. (1914, July) The Vegetable Garden. University Bulletin, Vol. 5, N.S. (No. 7), p.13. Photograph is captioned, "Globe or Bur Artichokes."

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
